mention.text: drug traffickers , self-defense groups , groups of hired gunmen trained by foreign mercenaries
the israeli mercenaries wearing blue uniforms during war maneuvers with the drug-traffickers far right-wing groups ' private army
the self-defense groups in the middle magdalena region
the first persons to notify the prosecutor general of the nation , the highest authority , about the presence of foreign mercenaries among the drug-traffickers far right-wing armed groups
deserters from the middle magdalena self-defense groups -- identified as jesus alberto molina urrea , ricaurte duque arboleda , and victor arboleda duque
important members of the association of middle magdalena cattlemen , the self-defense groups , and morena
